text: We may earn a commission from links on this page. Deal pricing and availability subject to change after time of publication. You can get Windows 11 Pro on sale for $19.97 right now (reg. $199) through November 10. The activation code upgrades two compatible PCs with the Windows 11 2024 update (the 24H2 version), which includes a faster, more secure code, a redesigned Copilot experience, and better phone integration. This Pro version also includes features not found in the free Home version like remote desktop, BitLocker device encryption, Azure AD, Hyper-V, assigned access, and Windows Sandbox. System requirements include a minimum 4GB of RAM and 64GB of available storage.You can get Windows 11 Pro on sale for $19.97 right now (reg. $199) until November 10 at 11:59 p.m. PT, though prices can change at any time.
html:
We may earn a commission from links on this page.
Deal pricing and availability subject to change after time of publication.

You can get Windows 11 Pro on sale for $19.97 right now (reg. $199) through November 10. The activation code upgrades two compatible PCs with the Windows 11 2024 update (the 24H2 version), which includes a faster, more secure code, a redesigned Copilot experience, and better phone integration. This Pro version also includes features not found in the free Home version like remote desktop, BitLocker device encryption, Azure AD, Hyper-V, assigned access, and Windows Sandbox. System requirements include a minimum 4GB of RAM and 64GB of available storage.

You can get Windows 11 Pro on sale for $19.97 right now (reg. $199) until November 10 at 11:59 p.m. PT, though prices can change at any time.
